title: RYAN NEFF Quits AS I LAY DYING
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
text: Bassist and vocalist Ryan Neff has quit As I Lay Dying less than one month ahead of their European tour. Neff commented on quitting, saying the decision is the right one for his "personal and professional journey." Neff joined As I Lay Dying in 2022. The band has not yet commented on Neff's departure or announced a replacement. "As of today, I have made the decision to leave As I Lay Dying," wrote Neff. "This choice comes after much reflection, and I believe it is the right step for my personal and professional journey. I am grateful for the experiences and connections I've made during my time with the band. Thank you to all the fans for your support." As I Lay Dying's European tour features Caliban, Decapitated, and Left To Suffer as the openers.
